I found a solution to some .dll problems that occured when I tried to start the game. First I was told that "d3dx10_42.dll" was missing. So i simply downloaded the file here:

http://www.dll-files.com/pop.php?dll=d3dx10_42

But it was apperently more .dll-files that was missing. This time it asked for "d3dx9_42.dll". I think it was 5 .dll-files that was missing before the game started. But all those files can easily be downloaded from: http://www.dll-files.com/

Hope this helps. :)
And yeah, the .dll-files should be placed in the "Binaries" folder. =)

When you run the game are you getting a message saying: You are running version XX and you need to update to version XX or you can't play the game?

Here's some advice, do NOT update your game, you are clicking on the wrong Icon. The icon that the game makes on Desktop or Games Explorer actually runs the MohUpdater.exe file first before load Moh.exe.

To fix this just delete that Icon that the install made and go to the Game's directory into the Binaries folder and make your own shortcut to the MOH.EXE file. TADA!!!! You can now play the game. At least that's what worked for me, hope it works for you too.

P.S. Oh ya, use the TRIVIUM crack it works and no viruses.

ATTENTION!

The game works fine, when you apply the following crack
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5883591/_Medal_Of_Honor_Limited_Edition_Crack_working__%5BFull_ISO_FPS_201

When you appy the crack, DO NOT COPY THE FOLDER!! You OPEN the folder and copy whats inside the folder. Then you paste the files into the Binaries folder that came with the game torrent. I said copy and not move just in case something happens with the game torrent or you mess up.

If you get a .dll error such as 'd3dx10_42.dll is not found' Google the file and download it from one of the sites that pop up. After you download the file, go to My Computer and search for System32, then copy file to the said folder.

Try this, it worked for me. 

1) start the single player game and quickly press ctrl+alt delete and bring up the task manager. 

2) Find "moh.exe" in the processes part and right click on it. Press Affinity and uncheck one of the CPU cores. 

3) alt tab back into the game and try to play it.
